name: Every Bullet At Once
description:
Simple 4-level puzzle-platformer bullet-time bullet hell for Brackeys Game Jam 2021. Hope you enjoy, this is my first full game project! :]

click to place bullets, then press F to fire them all simultaneously

Red lasers kill you, yellow lasers kill your bullets

Press R to reset

Code and Sprites by William Kuhne

Music and Menu Splash by Taylor Aguiar
